description:
This resource provides the Hostname resource in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Load Balancer service.

Adds a hostname resource to the specified load balancer. For more information, see
[Managing Request Routing](https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Balance/Tasks/managingrequest.htm).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Hostname.description: (Updatable) A virtual hostname. For more information about virtual hostname string construction, see [Managing Request Routing](https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Balance/Tasks/managingrequest.htm#routing).  Example: `app.example.com`.

LoadBalancerId.description: The [OCID](https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/identifiers.htm) of the load balancer to add the hostname to.

Name.description: A friendly name for the hostname resource. It must be unique and it cannot be changed. Avoid entering confidential information.  Example: `example_hostname_001`.
